item.title: C# 10 new feature CallerArgumentExpression, argument check and more
item.description: The CallerArgumentExpression has been discussed for years, it was supposed to a part of C# 8.0 but got delayed. Finally this month it is delivered along with C# 10 and .NET 6.&#160;&#8230;

item.title: Change-making problem - Wikipedia
item.description: The change-making problem addresses the question of finding the minimum number of coins (of certain denominations) that add up to a given amount of money. It is a special case of the integer knapsack problem, and has applications wider than just currency.

item.title: Windows 10 and 11 minimal setup for HDR video playback and streaming
item.description: On last Black Friday, I purchased a 50-inch 4K HDR10 smart TV with only $150. I use it as monitor for my computer. I didn’t find a walk through tutorial for the whole HDR (High Dynamic Range) setup,&#160;&#8230;

item.title: Cloudflare blocks an almost 2 Tbps multi-vector DDoS attack
item.description: Earlier this week, Cloudflare automatically detected and mitigated a DDoS attack that peaked just below 2 Tbps — the largest we’ve seen to date.
